descriptions.description: The Revision Control System (RCS) manages multiple revisions of files. RCS automates the storing, retrieval, logging, identification, and merging of revisions. RCS is useful for text that is revised frequently.

set.commands: oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.gz oegpatch 001 # If SA_SIGINFO, SIGHUP, SIGQUIT, SIGPIPE, SIGXCPU, SIGXFSZ are undefined. configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --enable-threads=windows --without-libpth-prefix --with-gnu-ld make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
